Privacy Policy Cambridge University Press India Pvt. Ltd. is committed to protecting your privacy. We collect information about you so that we can process your orders and provide a more personalized shopping experience. Please read more details about our privacy policy.
How do we use the information we collect from you?
When you sign up for our e-Notices service, we need only an e-mail address-- to send you the information you requested.
Soon, we will personalise your shopping experience by using your purchases to offer our recommendations about the books and other merchandise that might interest you. For this, we monitor customer traffic patterns and site usage to develop the design and layout of our site.
We may also use the information we collect to occasionally notify you about important functionality changes to our web site, new cambridgeindia.org services, and special offers we think you'll find valuable. If you do not wish to receive this information, e-mail us at apassah@cambridge.org to change your preferences. Just remember to change your preferences for each account or e-mail address you have left with us.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: How does cambridgeindia.org protect its customer information?
SECTION.SUBTEXT: When you place orders or access your account information, we offer the use of a secure server. The secure server software encrypts all information you input before it is sent to us. In addition, all customer data we collect is protected against unauthorized access.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: What about "cookies"?
SECTION.SUBTEXT: "Cookies" are small pieces of information that are stored by your browser on your computer's hard drive. Our cookies do not contain any personally identifying information, but they will enable us to provide a personalised service and to store items in your shopping bag between visits.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: Will cambridgeindia.org disclose the information it collects to outside parties?
SECTION.SUBTEXT: cambridgeindia.org does not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to others. We may choose to do so in the future with trustworthy third parties, but you can tell us not to by sending an e-mail to apassah@cambridge.org. (If you use more than one e-mail address to shop with us, send this message from each e-mail account you use.) Also, cambridgeindia.org may provide aggregate statistics about our customers, sales, traffic patterns, and related site information to reputable third-party vendors, but these statistics will include no personally identifying information. cambridgeindia.org may release account information when it believes, in good faith, that such release is reasonably necessary to (i) comply with law, (ii) enforce or apply the terms of any of our user agreements or (iii) protect the rights, property or safety of cambridgeindia.org, our users, or others.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: Your consent
SECTION.SUBTEXT: By using our web site, you consent to the collection and use of this information by cambridgeindia.org. If we decide to change our privacy policy, we will post those changes on this page so that you are always aware of what information we collect, how we use it, and under what circumstances we disclose it.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: We want your opinion
SECTION.SUBTEXT: cambridgeindia.org welcomes your questions and comments about privacy. Please send your e-mail to apassah@cambridge.org.
